ServiceResourceSkill.name: ServiceResourceSkill
ServiceResourceSkill.description: Represents the association between a skill and a service resource.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The date when the skill expires.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The date from when a service resource is assigned the skill.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the resource skill was last modified.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the resource skill was last viewed.

ServiceResourceId.description: The service resource related to the record.

SkillId.description: The skill related to the record.

SkillLevel.description: The service resourceâ€™s skill level. Skill level can range from zero to 99.99.

SkillNumber.description: An autogenerated number identifying the resource skill assignment.
